name: McCarthy Academy (Demo/Beta)
description:
Welcome to McCarthy Academy; home to the world's first program for super powered teens with behavioral problems. Our goal is to make sure that all children learn how to better control and manage their abilities.

Set in a city recovering from a civil war, you play as an ex-villain given one last chance to turn a new leaf. Will you change for the better, or plot revenge against those who disarmed you?

Demo/Beta includes:

  • 4 unique pathways to choose from (male and female partner options)
  • 78 + Sprites
  • Fully voiced cast
  • Hand-painted backgrounds
  • Investigation/Interrogation game play
  • Turn-based battle system

This demo is a beta design for a larger VN. Any donations will go toward making the larger game.

Content Warning

This game contains references to violence, abuse, self-injurious behavior, mental illness, death/suicide, and unethical medicine.  Viewer discretion advised.
